* Dinobot looked over the gun and snarled, he had training in targeting and 
various forms of hand to hand combat. As much as he liked fighting with no 
weapons but himself he knew that he needed to conserve energy, this weapon 
that he held in his palms was just the thing he needed right now in order to 
accomplish that factor.
He was about to explain to Tavatron that it all depended on the experience 
and weight of the occupant to decide what weapon to use when his scanners 
alerted him that danger was near.
Dinobot snapped his head towards the doors and growled deeply, they were 
here!!
He grasped the rifle tightly as he approached the doors and put a tentative 
hand on them, they were outside...right outside!
Dinobot looked at Tavatron in a way that she wouldn't mistake it's meaning, 
trouble was afoot. Battle was there...they just had too meet it head on.
He snarled...*

" Ready yourself, the time to face your fate has come."

* Dinobot stepped away from the doors and kept his rifle trained on the 
crack in the center where the two doors met, the first Predacon who came 
through those swinging slabs of steel would get the shock of his life!*
